Title: R: Directory Traversal
Synopsis: A vulnerability was found in R which could allow for remote code execution.

Background.Text: R is a language and environment for statistical computing and graphics.

Description.Text: The native R package installation mechanisms do not sufficiently validate installed source packages for path traversal.

Impact.Text: Installation of a malicious R package could result in an arbitrary file overwrite which could result in arbitrary code execution, as might be seen with the overwrite of an authorized_keys file.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All R users should upgrade to the latest version:
